technologies.title: Lazy Loading
technologies.description: It loaded pretty fast, right? This site uses lazy loading for dynamically loading the components for better performance and loading time

technologies.title: For everyone
technologies.description: This site contains accessibility features to help assistive technology (e.g. screen readers) and allow people with visual impairments to navigate with no obstacles.

technologies.title: Open Source
